title: Trump attacks senator as debate over judiciary ensnares Supreme Court nominee
text: During Blumenthal's campaign for Senate in 2010, he was criticized for claiming in speeches that he had served in Vietnam. Blumenthal had been in the Marine Corps Reserve and was not posted overseas. He later said he had misspoken about his record a few times out of the hundreds of speeches he has given in his political career.
summary:
During Blumenthal's campaign for Senate in 2010, he was criticized for claiming in speeches that he had served in Vietnam.
Blumenthal had been in the Marine Corps Reserve and was not posted overseas.
He later said he had misspoken about his record a few times out of the hundreds of speeches he has given in his political career.
